website_summaries.verdict: This book offers not just recipes but a formula for a life change.
pros: Author has a Master’s of Science in Nutrition Education
Includes information for overall healthfulness, as well as the pursuit of a Mediterranean-style diet
cons: Following all the recipes can require a good deal of time, prep, and expense
Lack of photos in the book

customer_reviews.title: Some formatting errors
customer_reviews.text: Note that if you buy the Kindle version, the prep pages that follow each week's menu are not useable or even able to be read as the formatting is scrambled.
customer_reviews.author: Up North Girl

customer_reviews.title: This has to be the best diet/cookbook I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best diet/cookbook I've ever purchased. The plan is easy to understand and use, the meals consisting of ingredients that are either on hand or easy to find anywhere. There is prep involved, but most of it is easily done within a half an hour, not including cook times. I have a renewed interest in cooking now, feel great, and am losing weight. Most of all, there isn't one dish in two weeks that I haven't enjoyed--if an ingredient (e.g. fennel) isn't what I like, I just pick another meal. This is a life-changing "how to" book!
customer_reviews.author: Aloosha

customer_reviews.title: Mediterranean diet...on a Diet.
customer_reviews.text: Most cook books will give you a couple of sample recipes in the "look inside" feature to see if it's something you would actually want to make. The reviews were good, so I took a chance...and I am disappointed I did. The recipes are not anything special and do not have a lot of flavor. I thoroughly enjoy cooking, and I am trying to adhere to a more Mediterranean diet, but I don't want to be on a "diet" which is exactly what this cookbook is. Mediterranean fare is already light, and this cookbook manages to take all the flavor out of everything. Amazon no longer allows free returns so this one will go in the donation bin.
customer_reviews.author: missashleysassy

customer_reviews.title: Love this book!
customer_reviews.text: This book is for everyone trying to eat healthier and lose the unwanted pounds...and the recipes are delicious!!! I can follow this plan without feeling the dreaded DIET!!!
customer_reviews.author: JODI W. BIENENFELD

customer_reviews.title: 92 items on the shopping list required for the first week!
customer_reviews.text: I was just looking for some classic Mediterranean cooking ideas to make my diet a little more healthy. Good grief! This is ridiculous. 92 items on the first week’s shopping list - 38 of which are produce. How in the heck is anyone supposed to eat 38 produce items before they rot?!? And the recipes? Insanely complicated and long, with little resemblance to anything I’ve ever had in my travels.Look, if you’ve ever been to Italy, Greece, or Spain, you know they don’t eat like this. And who the heck has the time to go through these recipes where the popcorn has 5 ingredients and a pizza takes an optimistic 60 minutes to prepare. This is worse than South Beach.
customer_reviews.author: Skis

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love! Very good recipes. If you don’t have any of the ingredients listed, it is very pricey to start with. However, if you already cook a lot, you will have the spices and basic ingredients. Delightful...i’ve lost 15 pounds in 3 months and am very satisfied with the delicious food. I can stay on this forever.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley

customer_reviews.title: Great diet plan with delicious recipes!!
customer_reviews.text: This book has been awesome at guiding me into learning about and following a Mediterranean diet! There is a nicely laid out menu plan to follow with delicious and simple recipes. I would recommend this book to anyone wanting a meal plan and to lose weight. I've been on the diet for 2 months and am down 25 lbs and counting.
customer_reviews.author: Candi

customer_reviews.title: Great Book!
customer_reviews.text: The book has been very helpful starting a healthier lifestyle. It contains daily recipes for meals and snacks that can be exchanged for other recipes in the book and an exercise section. I have started the plan this week, and I have found the recipes to be filling, and I feel great. Also, each recipe has nutritional information. Thank you for a great book to improve my overall health.
customer_reviews.author: AnnTN

customer_reviews.title: Dietitian Approved
customer_reviews.text: As an RD myself, I wanted to buy a book by an RD and it was definitely the right choice. She not only does an excellent job of explaining the science behind the Mediterranean diet, weight loss and exercise in a simple, understandable way, but provides insights and tips for each. In addition to providing recipes, there are four weeks planned out with shopping lists, daily menus, and logs for exercise and water. I definitely recommend this book for those wanting to try this diet, want to lose weight or even just eat healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Great Recipes
customer_reviews.text: At first I was overwhelmed with the planning and cooking. I've lived alone for a while now and had just stopped cooking. However, now that I'm into my 4th week, I can appreciate the number of great tasty recipes in this book, compared to other books in this category. I'm also exercising and losing 2 pounds a week. The food is yummy and satisfying. I recommend this book and the diet.
customer_reviews.author: carreng

customer_reviews.title: Missed the Mark
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed in the quality of the content. Hard boiled egg for breakfast 5 days in a row is not only boring, but distasteful. I hate hard boiled eggs and did not see any info on menu item swapping. I was really hoping for something a little more inspiring. It also didn't explain the diet concept very well, I get that it's a life style, but what sets this diet apart from the others out there?
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cookbook just like this, that has meals planned for an entire week (4 weeks worth!) along with a shopping list. The recipes make more than what my husband and I can eat, so there is time involved evaluating the plan and adjusting the shopping list. But I just scan the shop list, print and edit there then adjust the recipe accordingly...or make the full amount and divide into 2-person meals. Meal prep reminds me of one of the highly advertised home delivery services but easier and definitely fresher!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great plan- but you'll need a buddy
customer_reviews.text: Great tasty and healthy recipes. I especially like how you eat the previous nights dinner as lunch. I work, so it's nice to not be expected to cook three times a day like on some plans. A word of warning though: the dinner recipes are not designed for a single person (most make 4-6 servings) To avoid making way too much food, you should quarter the recipe or have someone else doing this with you for halved dinner recipes or a family of 3-4 for full recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Murray

customer_reviews.title: Pork milk steak.....not the. MEDITERRANEAN diet.
customer_reviews.text: Sent this book back immediately...it has pork milk loads of sugar and steak recipe s galore..this is not a MEDITERRANEAN diet book.
customer_reviews.author: deborah duck

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for diet guidelines as well as recipes. This book is light on the guidelines and the recipes are daunting, expensive and time consuming. I like that the nutrition information is included for the recipes so I can ensure I'm sticking to my caloric intake goals. The author gives you weekly menus with recipes, but then says if you're not losing weight, to cut back on the serving sizes. My goal is to LOSE WEIGHT while eating healthy. I don't have the patience to experiment with serving sizes to achieve weight loss.
customer_reviews.author: J. AdamTop Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: Love this very easy to use book!
customer_reviews.text: Simplistic, easy to follow, great information. I read this book in two hours, highlighted a lot of information and started cooking right away! Exactly what I was looking for! This is not a diet it is a healthy lifestyle change!
customer_reviews.author: Julianne Sunseri

customer_reviews.title: Love the this plan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book to help with portion control and weight loss. So far it has not disappointed. The 28 day meal plans are easy to follow and make substitutions of foods I don't care for. Love the crab cake recipe. I have just finished my first week of the plan and I'm down 4.4 lbs. I know most of this is water weight but I can't wait to see what happens after the 28 days. It's a plan I can live with. Now I'm looking for a cookbook with more recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Lack of pictures
customer_reviews.text: The basic information is fine. However when it comes to cooking recipes, I like having pictures to refer to to ensure what the results should look like and if it is something I am interested in. I found myself looking over the book and then setting it down as it didn't entice me to keep referring to it.
customer_reviews.author: ganadundon

customer_reviews.title: A total waste of monet
customer_reviews.text: The book is all about the authors personal preferences and her telling us how to live our lives according to her values. I donated it to the local thrift store.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Recipes Arr Too Fussy
customer_reviews.text: The amount of time to make these recipes in the book are too short. It took me a lot longer. Also, the recipes could have been streamlined in many ways. Too many had saute then bake or broil. Few crockpot recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive an complex for one person
customer_reviews.text: I'm a single person living alone. Love the concept, but I have a cart that took me over an hour to fill with the first week shopping list and still going; $250. still going. I'm sure the recipes are good, but half the things I make will end up going bad so I don't think this book is for everyone. I'm going to try a more basic version.
customer_reviews.author: Swappy T

customer_reviews.title: Too many steps and ingredients for me
customer_reviews.text: The book did not build my enthusiasm for the Mediterranian diet. The recipes sounded good but not exciting and I don’t want to go through so many steps and ingredients after working all day.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: I am really liking how the menus are planned out along with a grocery list. I feed a family of 4 & make my husband (who also likes the menu) lunch too. The dinners make enough for all 4 of us & we have 2 lunches. The recipes are simple. I don’t mind meal prep. I have a sweet tooth but enjoy having the mini muffins & date nut energy balls. I also like that it is a 4 week plan. I like the balance of foods.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot of good recipes.
customer_reviews.text: The cook book contains a lot of good recipes and a good portion of them gluten-free, vegetarian, with listed dairy alternatives. The recipes were well explained and there were a few illustrations.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Heather's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: too much strange food to buy.
customer_reviews.text: A person would have to spend many dollars per week to have enough food on hand to make recipes.
customer_reviews.author: when retired

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to understand, lists and menus of what you will need. Would like more pictures of the recipes, but overall, very happy with purchase. Hoping to ease my arthritis and fibromyalgia.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanette Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Med is Best
customer_reviews.text: I was able to lose 8 pounds following this 28 day Mediterranean diet. The recipes were easy to follow, the food had amazing flavor. I decided to continue the diet for 3 more weeks. Mediterranean will become part of my weekly meal plan.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs B

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Book was good with easy to follow recipes. Easy to follow the logic of the weight loss plan with food and exercize.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Missing serving sizes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book. Lots of good, easy recipes to make. My only complaint is that the recipes do not tell you what the serving size is. It may say 1 serving - but it does not tell you if that 1 serving is a cup, 1/2 cup, whole chicken breast, half chicken breast, etc. It still makes dieting a bit of a guessing game but at least I am doing it with good, healthy food.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Moulison

customer_reviews.title: I love this book!
customer_reviews.text: This book has been super helpful for me getting on a healthy eating program. I love that the book has grocery lists, recipes and helpful information.
customer_reviews.author: Carol B.

customer_reviews.title: Not what i was looking for...
customer_reviews.text: Concentrates too much the weight loss aspect and not enough on the healthful eating and benefits of the diet. I realize it is a “diet” but I wish they would call it something else because it is a way of life eating not meant to be lived with measuring cups and calorie counters.
customer_reviews.author: Daizymaizey

customer_reviews.title: Healthy weight loss
customer_reviews.text: Great recipes. Very delicious and broadening. Many for 4 to 6 so challenging to follow week's menu with so many left overs!
customer_reviews.author: s sykas

customer_reviews.title: Delicious breakfast routine
customer_reviews.text: A chocolate banana smoothie every morning is a great way to start a weight loss day. The other recipes are easy and delicious. The salads and homemade dressing are wonderful; even for someone who does not like lettuce.
customer_reviews.author: Sea Gal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to follow flavorful recipes
customer_reviews.text: This book is perfect for someone getting started with the Mediterranean diet lifestyle. The recipes are easy follow and VERY flavorful without using too much salt. If you are considering a healthy lifestyle start here. You will not be disappointed :)
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Jones

customer_reviews.title: Another one of my favorite cookbook
customer_reviews.text: Another one of my favorite cookbooks. It is helping me with weight loss and getting starting on the weight loss program.
customer_reviews.author: Anita Young

customer_reviews.title: Classic.  Simple.
customer_reviews.text: Good basic cookbook which stands up to the test of time. Easy to follow. Uses common ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Addict

customer_reviews.title: My Eating Healthy Journey
customer_reviews.text: This book is just what I was looking for a simple read with an accommodating grocery list, illustrations are yummy and it comes with a plan. This will help me accountable for what I eat. I'll give two more reviews within the next month.
customer_reviews.author: Kay Kay

customer_reviews.title: Really good recipes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this book on my Kindle but after reading it, knew that I had to have the actual book. I've tried several of the recipes...they are simple and delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Andreasinwa

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good plan for life, but not that fast of weight loss.
customer_reviews.author: customsat

customer_reviews.title: Tastiest Diet Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite cookbook. We love every meal, every recipe. We are eating healthily and feeling great!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy June Craig

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: Really love this book!! I was hesitant at first but our family has adjusted easily to it. The recipes are flavorful, some recipes involve more prep than others, there are leftovers for next day lunch meals, I don’t feel deprived of food and over all like the new healthy options this is giving. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: brent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is easy when there is a mediterranean market to go to. Otherwise you have to cook
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time intensive and expensive.
customer_reviews.text: This cookbook was written by someone that loves to cook and doesn’t have any concerns with the cost of food. Unfortunately neither one is me. Expect to pay $200 or more for food per week. And spend a lot of time cooking and prepping. After the first week I was done. I regret buying and trying this book. However if you are someone that enjoys spending time in the kitchen with no food budget, this book may work for you.
customer_reviews.author: Faith Faith BBE, CTM, NE

customer_reviews.title: Great book for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This book describes the ideas behind this diet and makes it super easy. Each week there is a shopping list for groceries, a meal plan for breakfast, lunch, dinner each day of the week, and then a bunch of recipes. This book is laid out so well, I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Naser alangery

customer_reviews.title: Great Book
customer_reviews.text: Good approach on health diet and exercise and menus planning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great diet
customer_reviews.text: Not the fastest way to loose weight, but I am eating much healthier and in return feeling better. Great recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Great cook book
customer_reviews.text: Amazing cook book. Just recited it the other day and So many great recipes and can’t wait to try making all of them.
customer_reviews.author: David Field

customer_reviews.title: Book Review
customer_reviews.text: I actually have not used this book yet. I have it on my Kindle and plan on using it when we travel in our camper. It looks interesting though.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi Kinkead

customer_reviews.title: Great, simple recipies
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad recipe in this book!!! Healthy eating without feeling like a diet or major lifestyle/eating change!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kay R.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to love this book
customer_reviews.text: My husband & I love this easy to follow book. Great recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Fink

customer_reviews.title: Great book!
customer_reviews.text: Really helpful and lost some weight and got some good recipes to add to everyday collection.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Easy read
customer_reviews.text: This book is an easy read with simple advice and understandable wording. The recipes are not two complicated but can be pricey. Over all I am looking forward to trying this diet.
customer_reviews.author: Erica J.

customer_reviews.title: Must have book
customer_reviews.text: Great book. Great recipes and ideas for eating a Mediterranean diet.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Love this book
customer_reviews.text: Great ideas for changing my eating habits and having a new lifestyle
customer_reviews.author: Janet LaSan

customer_reviews.title: Not a Mediterranean Diet
customer_reviews.text: Basically, this is a primer - Not a Diet book.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Mcmillan

customer_reviews.title: Delicious recipes
customer_reviews.text: Very tasty recipes that are simple to make. The ingredients and spices are simple and easy to find in a grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: Kimco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: VERY well written and every recipe worked well and was delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity Browne

customer_reviews.title: Just Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good book of recipes but I think the Mediterranean Diet isn't for me because of food choice.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Very positive read and does make one feel like it is a diet  worth sticking to.
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for the facts this would be a great book to start with. Although I have done some research on this diet, or eating style sure does make me feel better
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Water Damaged Book 😡
customer_reviews.text: My review is mainly on the fact that my cookbook arrived today & the cover is torn from the spine because of water damage. I’m extremely upset & would like a replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sanford

customer_reviews.title: There is so much more to this book than recipes.  Tracking suggestions and exercise plans are also a part.  Counseling available
customer_reviews.text: If you buy this wonderful cookbook, I highly recommend the on-line version. All the meals have links to the recipes. The day's meal is clearly spelled out. I lost 8 pounds in the one month I have been using it. Recipes are not hard, but do require prep time. Lots of flavor in all the dishes and very easy to follow. Dinner becomes the next days lunch most of the time. Never hungry because of healthy snacks. I will be following this type of diet for a long time, even when I have lost the last 10 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Anders

customer_reviews.title: Love this book
customer_reviews.text: My diet loomed so boring until I bought this as an e-book. Liked it so much, told a friend and we both bought the paperback version so we can dog ear and save recipes we loved. We both are on out weight loss journey together and I look forward to trying new things.
customer_reviews.author: LivoniaGal

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Recipes are too time consuming for a person who works 10 hour days. I was looking for faster recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Stoltz

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes
customer_reviews.text: I use this book a lot for new recipes. Lots of good ones
customer_reviews.author: cingen

customer_reviews.title: Holistic well being
customer_reviews.text: Great recipes Can't wait to try them. I love the holistic approach to my well being. It's all very sensible.
customer_reviews.author: MINERVA GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: Great book
customer_reviews.text: Great book filled with practical recipes. I highly recommend it for anyone looking for a “non-diet” type of healthy eating.
customer_reviews.author: chavon

customer_reviews.title: Hoping this works
customer_reviews.text: Starting this diet and it helps explains proper diet intake with easy recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Donnie Nashville

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to cookbook collection!
customer_reviews.text: Healthy cooking at its finest. I will be honest I bought the book mostly for the recipes so I can't speak much to the diet. I've had this a few weeks or so and I've tried three recipes, a soup and two veggie sides. PHENOMENAL!! Recipes are easy to follow, I haven't yet come across an ingredient that would be hard to find, and the outcome is always scrumptious!
customer_reviews.author: Lovin' Life

customer_reviews.title: Great recipes and advice!
customer_reviews.text: I would like more pictures of the finished dish. I love the ones you included. Thanks for the great book!
customer_reviews.author: Mary K Ledesma

customer_reviews.title: Mediterranean Diet
customer_reviews.text: Recipe's are simple to follow and there is a great variety
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, low-fat, but flavorful recipes
customer_reviews.text: Really a great plan to follow. Lots of good recipes, with actual flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Clark

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Helpful Guide for a Great Eating Plan
customer_reviews.text: I’m on Week 3 and love the menus and recipes I’ve tried. However, the 4 instead of 5 stars is because of the extensive grocery lists for each week! I would recommend a basic pantry list at the beginning and shorten the weekly grocery requirements. I am a convert to the Mediterranean eating plan but I do explore other resources to compare.
customer_reviews.author: Animal Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great way to kick off a diet.
customer_reviews.text: Book was very helpful. Good menus and recipes for the first 28 days
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Mann

customer_reviews.title: I am grateful I found this book
customer_reviews.text: This book is well put together and the majority of the recipes are amazing. I would have never thought of adding some of these ingredients together. I have been on the diet for almost 2 weeks and have had great results a loss of 5 pounds. I feel that this is something that I can do for the rest of my life. I am grateful that I found this book.
customer_reviews.author: alisha c

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT tips for portion control and easy to remember
customer_reviews.text: Well written...EXCELLENT tips for portion control and easy to remember. Book makes you feel like you have a nutritionist and personal trainer with you along the way guiding you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm not convinced that this does a good job following the guidelines of the Mediterranean Diet
customer_reviews.text: I'm not convinced that this does a good job following the guidelines of the Mediterranean Diet. Many recipes include things not listed under their guidelines. Also, a lot of the beginning goes over what the general public already knows....
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Love the Book
customer_reviews.text: Love the concept. Easy to follow. The 2 recipes I've made so far are really good. I may have finally found a diet I can succeed on!
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Feel the Passion
customer_reviews.text: WOW! Great journey reading Julene Stassou's expertise in nutrition, diet, exercise, menu planning, shopping, and delicious recipes many of which depict her warm and loving upbringing in a Greek/American multi-generational home. Photogenically superb! A must read and follow for a sound and healthy life without guilt.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the book is fabulous. Every recipe is delicious. ...
customer_reviews.text: the book is fabulous. Every recipe is delicious. The information helps you understand exactly what is necessary to eat healthy. I have sent the book to my nieces.
customer_reviews.author: dorothy karras

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Tried other Mediterranean books but this one is my fave so far
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This plan was made easier by prepping ingredients a few days ahead of time. The recipes in this book were absolutely amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Simone P.

customer_reviews.title: Working wonders for me
customer_reviews.text: Loosing 2lbs a week so far with Julene. Really enjoyed the recipes I made so far.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: It's a good book to get a start especially if you can't ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a good book to get a start especially if you can't cook. Lots of recipes. I wish it included more technical information on what's good and what to stay away from. By reading the recipes I figured it out. I can cook so this section was a waist of time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the 28 day menu ideas which include plan ahead ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the 28 day menu ideas which include plan ahead tips and great recipes. Great book, glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service with this order though
customer_reviews.text: Not the right book for my liking. Great customer service with this order though!
customer_reviews.author: jclife

customer_reviews.title: This is a great book for living every day
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book for living every day: eating, resting, exercising. It is easy to read and understand and has fantastic recipes!
customer_reviews.author: Sherry F.

customer_reviews.title: The cookbook itself is excellent. I only gave it 4 stars because I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my weight loss was at a plateau and I was hoping that this would help me over that plateau. The cookbook itself is excellent. I only gave it 4 stars because I hate vegetables and this is basically what a Mediterranean diet consists as well as seafood (another dislike).
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn R. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Looks yummy recipes
customer_reviews.text: Looks good haven't tried anything yet just read through it.
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Not the Diet for Me!
customer_reviews.text: Did not think I could handle this diet so decided to go with the South Beach diet.
customer_reviews.author: Martha E. Cathcart

customer_reviews.title: Needs pictures
customer_reviews.text: Great recipes. Easy to follow. Would be nice to have pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Christine L. Zappas

product_meta.title: The Mediterranean Diet Weight Loss Solution: The 28-Day Kickstart Plan for Lasting Weight Loss
